basics.name: Lee Guan Feng
basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary: A software engineer, optimist, and team player. I currently work as the VP of Product at Orcus, where I lead the product team in building and shipping products that help our clients manage their customer orders.

work.name: Orcus Consulting
work.summary: Orcus is a IT consulting company that provides software development and product management services to clients in the food and beverage industry.
highlights: Managed a portfolio with a MRR of $5,000, achieving customer satisfaction rates over 95%.
Consulted with Jayden Foods to understand their needs and provide tailored technical solutions.
Developed Eevan, a B2B e-commerce web app that automates order entry, significantly reducing manual labor and errors, and cutting manpower costs by 30%.

work.name: ProcoLink
work.summary: ProcoLink is an AI consultancy company that provides AI-powered solutions to businesses in the IT helpdesk industry.
highlights: Grew the company's valuation by 5 times in 2 months, leading to a successful acquisition by Computer Guys.
Spearheaded the design and implementation of AIRES, an advanced AI-driven IT helpdesk support system.
Developed AI solutions that reduced the need for human agents, cutting manpower costs by 50%.
Designed a robust system architecture integrating a ticketing system, multi-channel communications, and prompt engineering, ensuring scalability and performance.

awards.title: 2nd Place in Code Overflow Hackathon
awards.summary: Our team of four won the CodeOverflow Hackathon with our web app, Energy Calculator. Built with Flask, it helps households track energy usage and provides a dashboard with charts and eco-friendly recommendations. This award showcases our commitment to sustainable technology solutions.

awards.title: i.Code.i.Tell 2022 Certificate Of Participation Silver Award
awards.summary: Awarded for the proposal 'Just Menu', a web application designed to aggregate and digitize menus from various food stalls across Singapore, enabling customers to access menus anytime, anywhere, and allowing vendors to upload and manage their menus online. This innovative solution aimed to reduce wait times, prevent over/undercharging, and provide a universal platform for menu access.

references.name: Felix Liang, President at Orcus
references.reference: Jeff is really knowledgeable when it comes to full-stack web applications. Not only did he meet the given deadline, but also went the extra mileand added improvements to my UI design. Will definitely work with him in the future!

references.name: Chong Y., Director at SGWIFIMAN
references.reference: Jeff had developed awebsite application for me and it works great.

projects.name: aitk (AI ToolKit)
highlights: aitk is a versatile collection of AI tools accessible directly from the terminal.
It addresses everyday issues such as image conversion and streamlines the workflow to access AI tools through the CLI.

projects.name: Lecture Summariser
highlights: Lecture Summariser is an AI web app created to address the issue of lengthy and unengaging lecture videos.
Users can upload lecture videos, and the app will summarize them for easier consumption.
